src:
Luis za siću u Ostinu osvaja šestu titulu
Britanac, do sada najtrofejniji u SAD treba da osvoji samo četiri boda, odnosno tek osmo mesto za overu šampionskog znamenja

01 Nov 2019

Teksaški masakr Ferarijevih nada za ovu sezonu, odnosno definitivna overa šeste titule za Luisa Hamiltona deluju neminovno za najvijače Skuderije uoči VN Amerike. Naime, Britancu trebaju tek četiri boda, odnosno osmo mesto za pečat titule koja će njegovoj ekipi pored već osvojene konstruktorske doneti i titulu u konkurenciji vozača.
Hamilton do ovih bodova naspram svega već viđenog može lako. Ta konstatacija zaista stoji pre 19. trke ove sezone, budući da smo u Meksiku smo pre nedelju dana videli Hamiltonovu besprekornost za volanom u kombinaciji sa nemački preciznim potezima Mercedes AMG Petronasa. Ocena deset za ovu ekipu došla je pre svega zbog sjajne strategije i izbora pneumatika, što je za krajnji ishod imalo potpuno brisanje potencijalno kapitalno važnog Ferarijevog vlasništva nad prvim startnim redom.





SVE MOZZART KVOTE ZA VN SAD


Kada smo već kod kapitalisanja, dobro je da kažemo da su mnogi MOZZART igrači nakon ove trke mogli da se raduju. Zato smo i ovoga puta našli za shodno da prodiskutujemo dešavanja u Ostinu, sećajući se i ovonedeljnih vrelih tema, odnosno prekornih pogleda upućenih ka boksu Red Bula, preciznije Maksa Ferštapena. Naime, on je mnogo, previše grešio u Meksiku, pa ga je Luis Hamilton nazvao „magnetom za nesreće“. Zbog toga mu Britanac ostavlja više prostora u borbama, za svaki slučaj, čisto da ovaj ne bi bez bojazni poslao njegovu Srebrnu strelu u travu, šljunak, ili u najgorem scenariju u neku barijeru. S ovim konstatacijama složio se i Sebastijan Fetel, pa će na VN Amerike zaista biti interesantno videti da li će nastaviti da pršte varnice koje su obeležile VN Meksika.


ODIGRAJ TIKET NA SVE MOGUĆE MOZZART VARIJANTE NA TRCI U TEKSASU


Ineče, u sklopu najave VN Amerike zgodno je reći da je pet pobeda na ovom F1 događaju sakupio Mihael Šumaher između 2000. i 2006. godine, te da je godinu dana kasnije svoju prvu SAD pobedu zgrabio Luis Hamilton u Meklarenu. Slavio je on i na prvoj trci u Ostinu 2012. godine, pa rafalno od 2014. do 2017. vezao četiri slavlja na ovoj trci. Zbog toga, ma koliko jaki bili “SF90” bolidi Ferarijevih vozača Sebastijana Fetela i Šarla Leklera, teško je verovati da će nešto, odnosno neka viša sila poremetiti nameru Britanca da osvoji novu titulu za siću od tek četiri boda koja su mu za to u ovom času neophodna.  



Na kraju, vežno je da napomenemo da vas samo u MOZZARTU čekaju kvote za sve moguće scenarije VN SAD. Primera radi, verujete da neko množe da osvoji pol-poziciju, odnosno da vaš favorit ulazi u prvih šest vozača ili se možda penje na podijum… Nikakav problem, jer za sve ovo postoje ubedljivo najbolje igre od kojih će uzbuđenje gledanja treninga i same trke koja startuje u nedelju u 20.00 časova po srednjoevropskom vremenu biti na zavidnom nivou.





* Kvote će se menjati nakon treninga


PIŠE: Miloš MILIĆFOTO: Reuters/F1 Printscreen
text:
Lewis for Austin gets his sixth title
Briton, the most trophy in the US so far, to win only four points, or only eighth place to win the championship mark

01 Nov 2019

The Texas massacre of Ferrari's hopes for this season, that is, the definitive endorsement of the sixth title for Louis Hamilton, will inevitably work for Scuderia's most accomplished on the eve of US Grand Prix. Namely, the British need only four points, or eighth place to seal the title, which will bring his team in addition to the already won the constructor title and in the competition of drivers.
Hamilton to these points against everything seen before can easily. That statement really stands before the 19th race this season, since we were in Mexico a week ago to see Hamilton's impeccability behind the wheel combined with the German precision moves of the Mercedes AMG Petronas. Score of ten for this team came primarily because of its great strategy and tire selection, which in the end resulted in the complete erasure of the potentially capitalally important Ferrari ownership of the front row.





ALL MOZZART QUOTES FOR US VN


Speaking of capitalization, it is fair to say that many MOZZART players have been able to rejoice after this race. That is why this time we found it appropriate to discuss the events in Austin, remembering this week's hot topics, or the outrageous glances directed at the Red Bull box, or more precisely Max Ferstapen. Namely, he made many, many mistakes in Mexico, which is why Luis Hamilton called him an "accident magnet". Because of this, the Briton leaves him more room for fighting, just in case he doesn't send his Silver Arrow into the grass, gravel, or in the worst case scenario into a barrier. Sebastian Fettel agreed with these statements, so it will be really interesting to see whether the sparks that marked the GP of Mexico will continue to be sprayed on the US GP.


PLAY A TICKET ON ALL POSSIBLE MOZZART VARIETIES IN A Texas RACE


By the way, as part of the announcement of GP America it is convenient to say that five victories at this F1 event were collected by Michael Schumacher between 2000 and 2006, and that one year later he captured his first US victory at Lewis McLaren. He also celebrated the first race in Austin in 2012, bursting four celebrations in this race from 2014 to 2017. Therefore, no matter how strong the "SF90" cars of Ferrari drivers Sebastian Fettel and Charles Lecler are, it is hard to believe that something, or some higher power, would disrupt the Briton's intention to win a new title by only four points, hour necessary.



Finally, it is important to note that only in MOZZART are you waiting for quotas for all possible scenarios of the US Army. For example, you believe that someone multiplies to win the pole position, that is, your favorite enters the first six riders or maybe climbs the podium ... No problem, because for all of these there are convincingly the best games of which the excitement of watching training and the race itself starts on Sunday at 8 pm Central European Time to be at an enviable level.





* Odds will change after training


By: Milos MILICFOTO: Reuters / F1 Printscreen
